name: One Stone, Two Birds
description:
# Cross and Doublecross

Mr. Johnson has been working overtime on their scheme this time. There is a prototype to steal, there are people to frame, and there is the whole delicate balance of Neo-Tokyo etiquette to navigate. Skilled runners can make some valuable contacts and a fine amount of nuyen. Less-skilled runners might find themselves on a flight out of town in short orderâ€”possibly in a pine box in the cargo hold.
